name: bookmarks-for-spotify
author: Nils Dehl <mail@nils-dehl.de> (http://nils-dehl.de)
description: Bookmarks for Spotify - allows you to bookmark recently played song or audiobook tracks from Spotify.

scripts.build:sencha: cd client && sencha-6.5.0.180 app build production
scripts.git:tag: git checkout client/app.json && git checkout client/index.html && git add -A && git commit -m "v$APP_VERSION" && git tag v$APP_VERSION && git push && git push origin v$APP_VERSION
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run version:set && npm run build:sencha && npm run git:tag && npm run build:docker && npm run push:docker && npm run sloppy:change
